item.description:
Ristorante Fiore (www.ristorantefiore.com) is a very fiendly restaurant run by chef/owner Fiore Collela. We had dinner here last February and 23 people attended, with good reviews, if you check our past meet-up pages. Price ranges are: Salads $9-11, Antipasti $12-16, Pasta $17-28, Entrees $20-36. The portions are large. We'll begin the evening with an hour of mingling in the rear of the lounge from 6:00-7:00. At 6:30, a pianist plays live. After dinner, we'll cross the street and have coffee and dessert at Caffe Paradiso.

The restaurant is located on the left side of Hanover St. as you come from the Greenway, about 2 blocks down. Please bring cash, if possible, as we won't get separate checks. Twenty-five percent will be added for tax and tip. RSVP's accepted immediately.
item.name: Ristorante Fiore-Dinner
